property.name: business: costs: execution: other
property.description: Execution costs of the action-tool which do not fit to any other given setup costs.

property.name: business: costs: execution: run Hardware
property.description: Running hardware costs arising when using the action-tool (e.g. server rental costs).

property.name: business: costs: execution: software develop new features
property.description: Costs for developing new features which were not available in the software before.

property.name: business: costs: execution: software licence running
property.description: Running software licence costs of action-tool.

property.name: business: costs: execution: staff running
property.description: Running staff costs for operate the action-tool.

property.name: business: costs: execution: total
property.description: Total sum of costs needed to execute the action-tool.

property.name: business: costs: execution: total per object
property.description: Total action-tool execution costs incurring per object.

property.name: business: costs: setup: initial hardware
property.description: Initial hardware costs arising when using the action-tool (e.g. new hardware needs to be acquired to get the tool running).

property.name: business: costs: setup: other
property.description: Setup costs of the action-tool which do not fit to any other given setup costs.

property.name: business: costs: setup: software customization
property.description: Costs for customizing the software to user needs (e.g. company-branding, performance-settings, etc.)

property.name: business: costs: setup: software integration
property.description: Costs for integrating the software (get it running) in the current environment.

property.name: business: costs: setup: software licence inital
property.description: Initial software licence costs of action-tool.

property.name: business: costs: setup: staff external expertise needed
property.description: Cost for required external expertise.

property.name: business: costs: setup: staff training
property.description: Costs for training staff in using the action-tool.

property.name: business: costs: setup: total
property.description: Total sum of costs needed to setup the action-tool.

property.name: business: costs: total
property.description: Total sum of all costs arising when using the action-tool.

property.name: business: licencing schema
property.description: Licence applying to the action-tool.

property.name: interoperability: .Net API
property.description: Indicates whether it is possible to interact with the action-tool via a .net Application Programming Interface.

property.name: interoperability: batch processing support
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool supports batch processing.

property.name: interoperability: directory watch
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool supports input via directory watch. Directory watch polls specified directories for new Files. If new Files are detected they are processed.

property.name: interoperability: java API
property.description: Indicates whether it is possible to interact with the action-tool via a Java Application Programming Interface.

property.name: interoperability: other API
property.description: Indicates whether it is possible to interact with the action-tool via any other Application Programming Interface.

property.name: functional suitability: activity logging amount
property.description: The amount of logging output produced by a component, measured in the length of characters.

property.name: functional suitability: activity logging format
property.description: The format of logging output produced by a component.

property.name: functional suitability: activity traceability
property.description: Indicates to which degree the activities performed by the action-tool are traceable.

property.name: functional suitability: document: handling of not allowed image compressions
property.description: Method the action-tool handles an image compressis which is not permitted in the outcome.

property.name: functional suitability: document: handling of not allowed image formats
property.description: Method the action-tool handles a image format which is not permitted in the outcome.

property.name: functional suitability: document: handling of not allowed JavaScript
property.description: Method the action-tool handles JavaScript if it is not permitted in the outcome.

property.name: functional suitability: document: handling of not allowed moving images
property.description: Method the action-tool handles a moving image if it is not permitted in the outcome.

property.name: functional suitability: error reporting
property.description: Indicates whether errors at action execution are reported.

property.name: functional suitability: fraction of objects supported
property.description: Objects supported by the action-tool as percentage of overall objects of this type available.

property.name: functional suitability: image: XMP sidecar file support
property.description: Indicates if the action-tool is able to handle XMP sidecar files.

property.name: functional suitability: input-object validation
property.description: Indicates if the action-tool validates the input-object before processing.

property.name: functional suitability: macro support
property.description: Indicates if the action-tool supports macros.

property.name: functional suitability: number of input-formats supported
property.description: Number of input-formats supported by the action-tool.

property.name: functional suitability: number of objects supported
property.description: Total number of objects supported by the action-tool.

property.name: functional suitability: number of output-formats supported
property.description: Number of output-formats supported by the action-tool.

property.name: functional suitability: output-file format verification
property.description: Indicates if the action-tool verifies its produced output file for format correctness.

property.name: functional suitability: reported errors contain handling advice
property.description: Indicate whether reported error contain a handling advice/suggestion.

property.name: functional suitability: retain filename
property.description: Indicates if the action-tool is able to retain the filename of the input-file for the output-file.

property.name: functional suitability: understandability of reported errors
property.description: Indicates tho which degree reported errors are understandable to human users.

property.name: functional suitability: video games: byte-stream media support
property.description: The way the action-tool supports byte stream media.

ordinalScale.restriction: not applicable/not supported/supported as stand-alone file/supported encapsulated in file

property.name: functional suitability: video games: cd-rom support
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool is able to access and use the cd-rom drive.

property.name: functional suitability: video games: displays box artwork
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool is capable of displaying the box artwork.

property.name: functional suitability: video games: displays context details
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool is capable of displaying the context details.

property.name: functional suitability: video games: displays description of original media
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool is capable of displaying the description of the original media.

property.name: functional suitability: video games: displays manual
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool is capable of displaying the manual.

property.name: functional suitability: video games: displays necessary system configuration
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool is capable of displaying the necessary system configuration.

property.name: functional suitability: video games: displays original media
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool is capable of displaying the original media.

property.name: functional suitability: video games: displays originally supplied additional itmes
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool is capable of displaying the originally suplied additional items (like special controllers, accessories, etc.).

property.name: functional suitability: video games: displays reference to console video game system
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool is capable of displaying the reference to the console video game system.

property.name: functional suitability: video games: displays reference to preferred emulator
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool is capable of displaying the reference to the preferred emulator.

ordinalScale.restriction: yes - with system configuration/yes - without system configuration/no

property.name: functional suitability: video games: displays region lock-out information
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool is capable of displaying the region lock-out information.

property.name: functional suitability: video games: displays TV standard information
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool is capable of displaying the TV standard information.

property.name: functional suitability: video games: displays video display frequency information
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool is capable of displaying the display frequency information.

property.name: functional suitability: video games: game start mode
property.description: indicates in which way video games can be started by the action-tool.

ordinalScale.restriction: command line/user interface/ command line and user interface

property.name: functional suitability: video games: keyboard support
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool is able to access and use the keyboard.

property.name: functional suitability: video games: mouse support
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool is able to access and use the mouse.

property.name: functional suitability: video games: necessary accessories supported
property.description: Indicates in which way necessary accessories (e.g. special controller mandatory for playing a video game) are supported by the action-tool.

property.name: functional suitability: video games: original accessories supported
property.description: Indicates in which way original accessories (special controller, etc.) are supported by the action-tool.

ordinalScale.restriction: not applicable/not supported/supported with special hardware/supported without special hardware

property.name: functional suitability: video games: original media support
property.description: The way the action-tool supports original media.

ordinalScale.restriction: not applicable/not supported/supported with special hardware/supported without special hardware

property.name: functional suitability: video games: OS communication type
property.description: The way the action-tool communicates with the operating system.

property.name: functional suitability: video games: OS pre-installed
property.description: Property especially for emulator action-tools. It indicates if there is an OS preinstalled in the emulated environment.

property.name: functional suitability: video games: recreation level
property.description: Indicates on which levels the action-tool operates to be able to run the video game.

ordinalScale.restriction: high level and no BIOS is needed/low level and no BIOS is needed/high level and BIOS is needed/low level and BIOS is needed

property.name: functional suitability: video games: sound support
property.description: Indicates whether sound output is supported by the action tool.

property.name: functional suitability: video games: supported media types
property.description: Media types supported by the action tool.

ordinalScale.restriction: not applicable/neither byte-stream nor original media supported/original media but no byte stream supported/byte stream but not original media supported/byte stream and original media supported

property.name: maintainability: customization
property.description: Assessment of how easy it is to customize the action-tool according to specific user needs.

property.name: maintainability: modular design
property.description: Assessment of the action-tool design in terms of modularity.

property.name: maintainability: plug-in system
property.description: Indicates if and in what terms the action-tool implements plug-ins.

ordinalScale.restriction: yes - open specification/yes - closed specification/no/not observable

property.name: performance efficiency: batch processing maximum files
property.description: Maximum number of files supported at one batch run.

property.name: performance efficiency: memory per MB-input
property.description: Memory used per megabyte of input, measured in megabyte.

property.name: performance efficiency: memory per sample
property.description: Memory used per sample object, measured in megabytes.

property.name: performance efficiency: resource utilization
property.description: Indicates if and in which way the action-tool automatically uses available resources, like multiple processor cores, etc. to prallelize conversions.

property.name: performance efficiency: throughput
property.description: Processing throughput, measured in megabytes per second.

property.name: performance efficiency: time per MB
property.description: Elapsed processing time used per MB, measured in milliseconds.

property.name: performance efficiency: time per sample
property.description: Elapsed processing time used per sample object, measured in milliseconds.

property.name: portability: ease of integration in current environment
property.description: Assessment of how easy it is to integrate the action-tool into the current used server environment.

property.name: portability: multiple platform support
property.description: Indicates if the action-tool is capable of running on different platforms.

property.name: portability: runs on Linux
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool runs on Linux operating systems.

property.name: portability: runs on MacOS
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool runs on MacOS operating systems.

property.name: portability: runs on Windows
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool runs on Windows operating systems.

property.name: reliability: active community
property.description: Indicates if the action-tool has an active comminity around.

property.name: reliability: error correction
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tools is able to correct errors occured in the input-object or while converting it to the output-object.

property.name: reliability: error tolerance
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool is able to deal with errors in the input-object or while converting it to the output-object.

property.name: reliability: manufacturer status
property.description: Business status of the action-tool manufacturer.

ordinalScale.restriction: in business/no longer in same business/out of business

property.name: reliability: release cycle
property.description: The average action-tool release cycle.

property.name: reliability: runtime stability
property.description: Runtime stability of the action-tool.

property.name: reliability: support available
property.description: Indicates whether support is available for the action-tool.

property.name: reliability: under development
property.description: Indicates whether the action-tool is still under development.

property.name: usability: configuration method
property.description: Method the action-tool performs global system configuration.

ordinalScale.restriction: internal only / external parameter / configuration file

property.name: usability: documentation availibility
property.description: Availability of the action-tool documentation.

property.name: usability: documentation quality
property.description: Indicates the quality of the action-tool documentation.

property.name: usability: ease of administration
property.description: Assessment of how easy it is to administer the action-tool.

property.name: usability: ease of use
property.description: Assessment of how easy it is to use the action-tool.

property.name: usability: object configuration method
property.description: Method the action-tool performs object configuration.

ordinalScale.restriction: internal only / external parameter / configuration file / object encapsulated config

property.name: automated quality assurance possible
property.description: Indicates if the outcome supports automated quality assurance.

property.name: comparative archival storage costs
property.description: Archival storage costs compared to the original.

property.name: preservation watch and planning
property.description: Effects on preservation watch an planning costs.

property.name: quantitative archival storage costs
property.description: Quantitative archival storage costs per object over a time period of 10 years.

property.name: # of free tools (not open source)
property.description: Number of free, not open source tools which support the outcome format.

property.name: # of free tools (open source)
property.description: Number of free open source tools which support the outcome format.

property.name: # of proprietary tools
property.description: Number of proprietary tools which support the outcome format.

property.name: # of tools
property.description: Number of all tools which support the outcome format.

property.name: backwards compatibility
property.description: Indicates whether the outcome format is backwards compatible to previous versions.

property.name: complexity
property.description: Complexity of the outcome format.

property.name: database: support for column type datetime
property.description: Indicates whether the outcome format supports the database column type DateTime.

property.name: database: support for column type number
property.description: Indicates whether the outcome format supports the database column type Number.

property.name: database: support for column type string
property.description: Indicates whether the outcome format supports the database column type String.

property.name: documentation availability
property.description: Availability of the outcome format documentation.

property.name: documentation quality
property.description: Indicates the quality of the outcome format documentation.

property.name: embed custom metadata
property.description: Indicates whether additionaly metadata can be embedded in the outcome format.

property.name: embed image metadata
property.description: Indicates whether image metadata can be embedded in the outcome format.

property.name: embed preview image
property.description: Indicate whether a preview image can be embedded in the outcome format.

property.name: error awareness
property.description: Awareness to detect or recover errors.

property.name: identification possibilities
property.description: Possibilies to identify the outcome format.

property.name: image: interpreted data
property.description: Indicates whether the image contains interpreted data.

property.name: image: pdf creation possible
property.description: Indicates whether it is possible to create a pdf from the outcome format.

property.name: image: quality loss at reinterpretating
property.description: Indicates whether a quality loss occurs at reinterpretating the image.

property.name: image: zoom possible
property.description: Indicates whether the outcome format support zooming.

property.name: licence costs for use
property.description: Indicates whether licence costs occur at using the outcome format.

property.name: native browser support
property.description: Indicates whether the format can be natively displayed by browsers.

property.name: ocr possible
property.description: Indicates whether tools exists which can apply optical character recognition successfully to the outcome format.

property.name: readable as plain text
property.description: Indicates whether the outcome format is human readable as plain text.

property.name: rights
property.description: Existence of rights applying to the outcome format.

property.name: speed of change
property.description: Stability of the outcome format with respect to changes.

ordinalScale.restriction: less than 1 year/1-2 years/3-5 years/more than 5 years

property.name: standardization
property.description: Standardization of the outcome format.

property.name: ubiquity
property.description: Ubiquity or popularity of the outcome format.

property.name: usage restrictions possible
property.description: Indicates whether usage restrictions can be applied to the outcome format.

property.name: validation possibilities
property.description: Possibilies to validate the outcome format.

property.name: database: context: archival process client machine present
property.description: Indicates whether documentation of the client machine which executed the archival process is present.

property.name: database: context: archival process connection url present
property.description: Indicates whether the connection-url used to connect to the database for executing the archival process is documented.

property.name: database: context: archival process executing user present
property.description: Indicates whether the executing user of the archival process is documented.

property.name: database: context: archival process execution location present
property.description: Indicates whether the executing user of the archival process is documented.

property.name: database: context: archival process start time present
property.description: Indicates whether the start of the archival process is documented.

property.name: database: context: data dictionary present
property.description: Indicates whether a data dictionary is present in the database.

property.name: database: context: data dictionary quality
property.description: Indicates the quality of the present data dictionary.

property.name: database: context: data model present
property.description: Indicates whether a data model is present in the database.

property.name: database: context: data model quality
property.description: Indicates the quality of the present data model.

property.name: database: context: data model syntax
property.description: Syntax used in the present data model.

property.name: database: context: either the element metadata or the (external) data dictionary is present
property.description: Indicates whether metadata is present for each element. This means that either the element metadata or the (external) data dictionary must be present.

property.name: database: context: original database product present
property.description: Indicates whether the original database product is documented.

property.name: database: representation: datetimes according to SQL-99 standard
property.description: Indicates if datetime representations accord to SQL-99 standard.

property.name: image: image quality
property.description: Judged quality of the whole image.

property.name: image: text quality
property.description: Judged text quality in the given image.

property.name: video game: audio: music synchronous to video
property.description: Indicates how synchronous music appears to the related video.

ordinalScale.restriction: not applicable/severe errors apparent/small error noticeable/no error noticeable

property.name: video game: audio: sound synchronous to video
property.description: Indicates how synchronous sound appears to the related video.

ordinalScale.restriction: not applicable/severe errors apparent/small error noticeable/no error noticeable

property.name: video game: audio: speech synchronous to video
property.description: Indicates how synchronous speech appears to the related video.

ordinalScale.restriction: not applicable/severe errors apparent/small error noticeable/no error noticeable

property.name: video game: documentation: box artwork available
property.description: Indicates whether box artwork is available.

property.name: video game: documentation: manual available
property.description: Indicates whether the manual is available.

property.name: video game: documentation: original media available
property.description: Indicates whether information about the original game media is available.

property.name: video game: documentation: systems requirements specification available
property.description: Indicates whether an actual systems requirements specification is available.

property.name: video game: game configuration
property.description: The way game configuration takes place.

property.name: video game: game installation necessary
property.description: Indicates whether it is necessary to install the game, before being able to play it.

property.name: video game: game playable
property.description: Indicates whether the game is playable.

property.name: video game: game starts
property.description: Indicates whether the game starts. A game starts successfully if the start screen of the game shows up. A black screen after a start attempt is not enough to evaluate this property to true.

property.name: video game: graphics: 2D background scrolling
property.description: Indicates how good 2D background scrolling is working.

ordinalScale.restriction: no 2D objects displayed/not applicable/severe errors on whole image/errors noticeable but do not affect gameplay/no errors noticeable

property.name: video game: graphics: 2D collision detection
property.description: Indicates how good 2D collission detection is working.

ordinalScale.restriction: no 2D objects displayed/not applicable/severe errors/errors noticeable but do not affect gameplay/no errors noticeable

property.name: video game: graphics: 2D object layer placement
property.description: Indicates how good 2D object loayer placement is working.

ordinalScale.restriction: no 2D objects displayed/not applicable/severe errors on whole image/errors noticeable but do not affect gameplay/no errors noticeable

property.name: video game: graphics: 2D object position placement
property.description: Indicates how good 2D object position placement is working.

ordinalScale.restriction: no 2D objects displayed/not applicable/severe errors on whole image/errors noticeable but do not affect gameplay/no errors noticeable

property.name: video game: graphics: 3D object calculation
property.description: Indicates how good 3D object calculation is working.

ordinalScale.restriction: no 3D objects displayed/not applicable/severe errors on whole image/errors noticeable but do not affect gameplay/no errors noticeable

property.name: video game: graphics: 3D object clipping
property.description: Indicates how good 3D object clipping is working.

ordinalScale.restriction: no 3D objects displayed/not applicable/severe errors on whole image/errors noticeable but do not affect gameplay/no errors noticeable

property.name: video game: graphics: 3D texture quality
property.description: Indicates the quality of 3D texture quality.

ordinalScale.restriction: no 3D objects displayed/not applicable/severe errors on whole image/errors noticeable but do not affect gameplay/no errors noticeable

property.name: video game: graphics: screen overlay
property.description: Indicates in which way screen overlays are supported.

ordinalScale.restriction: not applicable/not supported/supported manually by loading image/supported by auto-detection/supported through encapsulation

property.name: video game: interactivity: additional items supported
property.description: Indicates if additional items (like game boards used in role-playing games) are supported by the game emulation itself (and therefore are not required physical), or if they are not supported and therefore are required to be physically present - otherwise the game cannot be played.

property.name: video game: interactivity: original hardware: special controller audible feedback
property.description: Indicates original special controller audible feedback (if applicable).

property.name: video game: interactivity: original hardware: special controller force feedback
property.description: Indicates original special controller force feedback (if applicable).

property.name: video game: interactivity: original hardware: special controller response delay
property.description: Indicates original special controller response delay (if applicable).

ordinalScale.restriction: not applicable/considerable delay/short delay/delay not noticeable

property.name: video game: interactivity: original hardware: special controller support
property.description: Indicates if and under what circumstances original special controller are supported.

ordinalScale.restriction: not applicable/not supported/supported with special hardware/supported with special software/native supported

property.name: video game: interactivity: original hardware: special controller visual feedback
property.description: Indicates original special controller visual feedback (if applicable).

property.name: video game: interactivity: original hardware: standard controller audible feedback
property.description: Indicates original standard controller audible feedback (if applicable).

property.name: video game: interactivity: original hardware: standard controller force feedback
property.description: Indicates original standard controller force feedback (if applicable).

property.name: video game: interactivity: original hardware: standard controller response delay
property.description: Indicates original standard controller response delay (if applicable).

ordinalScale.restriction: not applicable/considerable delay/short delay/delay not noticeable

property.name: video game: interactivity: original hardware: standard controller support
property.description: Indicates if and under what circumstances original standard controller are supported.

ordinalScale.restriction: not applicable/not supported/supported with special hardware/supported with special software/native supported

property.name: video game: interactivity: original hardware: standard controller visual feedback
property.description: Indicates original standard controller visual feedback (if applicable).

property.name: video game: interactivity: overlay response delay
property.description: Indicates overlay response delay (if applicable).

ordinalScale.restriction: not applicable/considerable delay/short delay/delay not noticeable

property.name: video game: interactivity: overlay support
property.description: Indicates whether overlays are supported

ordinalScale.restriction: not applicable/not supported but necessary for game play/not supported and not necessary for game play/supported but not necessary for game play/supported and necessary for game play

property.name: video game: interactivity: overlay usability
property.description: Indicates overlay usability (if applicable).

property.name: video game: interactivity: PC gaming hardware audible controller feedback
property.description: Indicates personal computer gaming hardware audible controller feedback (if applicable).

property.name: video game: interactivity: PC gaming hardware force controller feedback
property.description: Indicates personal computer gaming hardware controller force feedback (if applicable).

property.name: video game: interactivity: PC gaming hardware original feel
property.description: Indicates if and in which way standard pc gaming hardware exists which resembles the feel of the original.

ordinalScale.restriction: controllers resembling original controller not available/controllers resembling original controller not supported/controllers resembling original controller supported

property.name: video game: interactivity: PC gaming hardware original look
property.description: Indicates if and in which way standard pc gaming hardware exists which resembles the look of the original.

ordinalScale.restriction: controllers resembling original controller not available/controllers resembling original controller not supported/controllers resembling original controller supported

property.name: video game: interactivity: PC gaming hardware response delay
property.description: Indicates personal computer gaming hardware response delay (if applicable).

ordinalScale.restriction: not applicable/considerable delay/short delay/delay not noticeable

property.name: video game: interactivity: PC gaming hardware visual controller feedback
property.description: Indicates personal computer gaming hardware visual controller feedback (if applicable).

property.name: video game: interactivity: PC standard hardware audible controller feedback
property.description: Indicates personal computer standard hardware audible controller feedback (if applicable).

property.name: video game: interactivity: PC standard hardware force controller feedback
property.description: Indicates personal computer standard hardware controller force feedback (if applicable).

property.name: video game: interactivity: PC standard hardware response delay
property.description: Indicates personal computer standard hardware response delay (if applicable).

ordinalScale.restriction: not applicable/considerable delay/short delay/delay not noticeable

property.name: video game: interactivity: PC standard hardware support
property.description: Indicates if and in which way personal computer standard hardware is supported.

ordinalScale.restriction: supported and resemble look of original controller/supported/not supported

property.name: video game: interactivity: PC standard hardware usability
property.description: Indicates personal computer standard hardware usability (if applicable).

ordinalScale.restriction: not applicable/not acceptable/fairly playable/well playable/perfectly playable

property.name: video game: interactivity: PC standard hardware visual controller feedback
property.description: Indicates personal computer standard hardware visual controller feedback (if applicable).

property.name: video game: network support: lag for network play
property.description: Indicates the lag occuring at network play.

ordinalScale.restriction: not applicable/considerable delay/short delay/delay not noticeable

property.name: video game: network support: network protocols
property.description: Indicates whether network protocols are supported by the game.

property.name: video game: network support: use of original servers
property.description: Indicates it the use of the original servers is supported at network play.

property.name: compression
property.description: Compression used in outcome object.

property.name: document content: comments
property.description: Indicates in which way comments are preserved in the document.

property.name: document content: forms
property.description: Indicates in which way forms are preserved in the document.

property.name: document content: references
property.description: Indicates in which way references are preserved in the document.

property.name: document content: scripts
property.description: Indicates in which way scripts are preserved in the document.

property.name: document content: URL
property.description: Indicates in which way URLs are preserved in the document.

property.name: document features: accessibility
property.description: Indicates whether the document is accessible.

property.name: document features: content machine readable
property.description: Indicates whether the document content is machine readable.

property.name: document features: searchability
property.description: Indicates if and in which way the document is searchable.

property.name: format: conforms
property.description: Indicates whether the format of the result conforms to the output format specified by the component.

property.name: format: valid
property.description: Indicates whether the format of the object is valid.

property.name: format: valid and well-formed
property.description: Indicates whether the format of the object is valid and well formed.

property.name: format: well-formed
property.description: Indicates whether the format of the object is well formed.

property.name: image metadata: all data valid and well-formed
property.description: Indicates if all associated metadata is valid and well-formed.

property.name: image metadata: mets: valid DC/MODS
property.description: Indicates if METS-metadata contains valid DC/MODS data.

property.name: image metadata: mets: valid MIX
property.description: Indicates if METS-metadata contains valid MIX data.

property.name: image metadata: mets: valid PREMIS
property.description: Indicates if METS-metadata contains valid PREMIS data.

property.name: image metadata: xmp: valid DC
property.description: Indicates if XMP-metadata contains valid Dublin Core data.

property.name: image metadata: xmp: valid EXIF
property.description: Indicates if XMP-metadata contains valid EXIF data.

property.name: image metadata: xmp: valid IPTC
property.description: Indicates if XMP-metadata contains valid IPTC data.

property.name: relative filesize
property.description: Factor for relative output file size, calculated as: (size of output file / size of input file)

property.name: database: content: blobs bitstreams
property.description: Bitstreams of database binary large objects (blobs)

property.name: database: content: blobs contents
property.description: Content of database binary large objects (blobs)

property.name: database: content: blobs format metadata

property.description: Exposure index setting the camera selected

property.description: Exposure mode

property.description: Class of the program used by the camera to set exposure when the picture is taken.

property.name: image metadata: exif: exposure time
property.description: Exposure time used when the image was captured.

property.name: image metadata: exif: f number
property.description: Lens f-number (ratio of lens aperture to focal length) used when the image was captured.

property.description: Status of the flash when the image was shot.

property.description: White balance

property.description: Scene type

property.description: Software used

property.name: image metadata: tiff properties

property.description: All XMP data

property.name: image: aspect ratio
property.description: Aspect ratio of image, calculated as width/height. The number 1,35 can thus be read as 1,35:1

property.name: image: bits per sample
property.description: Bits per component for each pixel

property.name: image: colour space
property.description: Colour model of the decompressed image data.

property.name: image: height
property.description: Height of an image, measured in number of pixels on the y-axis.

property.name: image: ICC colour profile
property.description: ICC profile data

property.name: image: ocr text
property.description: Optical character recognition text extraxted from the image

property.name: image: orientation
property.description: Orientation of the image, with respect to the placement of widht and height, as it was saved to disk.

property.name: image: resolution
property.description: Width and height of an image in number of pixels represented as string (e.g. 1024x768).

property.name: image: resolution unit
property.description: Defines the unit of measure used to determine image height and image width.

property.name: image: sampling frequency unit
property.description: The unit of measurement for XSamplingFrequency and YSamplingFrequency.

property.name: image: similarity
property.description: Quantitative indication of similarity between input and ouput. A variety of distance metrics for image comparison are available.

property.name: image: width
property.description: Width of an image, measured in number of pixels on the x-axis.

property.name: image: x sampling frequency
property.description: The number of pixels, per definition samplingFrequencyUnit in the image height.

property.name: image: y sampling frequency
property.description: The number of pixels, per definition samplingFrequencyUnit in the image width.

property.name: video game: audio: music quality
property.description: Indicates music quality of the game.

property.name: video game: audio: sound quality
property.description: Indicates sound quality of the game.

property.name: video game: audio: speech quality
property.description: Indicates speech quality of the game.

property.name: video game: game speed
property.description: Speed performance of the game.

property.name: video game: graphics: colours
property.description: Graphics colour characteristics.

property.name: video game: graphics: frame rate
property.description: Frame rate of the game.

property.name: video game: graphics: hardware supported special effects quality
property.description: Indicates the quality of hardware supported special effects.

ordinalScale.restriction: no objects displayed/not applicable/severe differences to original/small differences to original/no differences noticeable

property.name: video game: graphics: image quality
property.description: Overall graphics image quality.

metric.name: equal
metric.description: Comparison of two values for equality

metric.name: Greater than or equal
metric.description: Comparison of two values for greater than or equal

metric.name: retained
metric.description: Indicator if all values in source measurement do exist in result measurement

metric.name: AE
metric.description: Absolute Error count of the number of different pixels (0=equal)

metric.name: PAE
metric.description: Peak Absolute Error

metric.name: PSNR
metric.description: Peak Signal to noise ratio (used in image compression papers). The ratio of mean square difference to the maximum mean square that can exist between any two images, expressed as a decibel value. The higher the PSNR the closer the closer the images are, with a maximum difference occurring at 1. A PSNR of 20 means differences are 1/100 of maximum.

metric.name: MAE
metric.description: Mean absolute error (average channel error distance)

metric.name: MSE
metric.description: Mean squared error (averaged squared error distance)

metric.name: RMSE
metric.description: (sq)root mean squared error -- IE: sqrt(MSE)

metric.name: MEPP
metric.description: Normalized Mean Error AND Normalized Maximum Error

metric.name: Equality judgement
metric.description: Judged comparison for equality

metric.name: deviation in percent
metric.description: Deviation to the original measured in percent. 0% means no deviation.

metric.name: video game image quality compliance
metric.description: Assess video game image quality compliance

ordinalScale.restriction: nothing displayed/severe errors on whole image/errors noticeable but don not affect gameplay/near perfect/no difference to original notiecable

metric.name: video game colour compliance
metric.description: Assess video game colour compliance

ordinalScale.restriction: severe errors affecting gameplay/errors but not affecting gamepley/near perfect/as in original

metric.name: video game hardware supported special effects compliance
metric.description: Assess video game hardware supported special effects compliance

ordinalScale.restriction: no objects displayed/not applicable/severe differences to original/small differences to original/no differences noticeable

metric.name: video game audio compliance
metric.description: Assess video game audio compliance

ordinalScale.restriction: not applicable/not supported/errors not acceptable/errors acceptable/near perfect/like original

metric.name: database character encoding trend
metric.description: Assess database character encoding trend

metric.name: database time encoding trend
metric.description: Assess database time encoding trend

metric.name: database schemas preserved
metric.description: Assess if and in which way database schemas are preserved

ordinalScale.restriction: all/all containing views or tables that are visible to archive users/incomplete/none

metric.name: database user defined datatypes (UDT) preserved
metric.description: Assess if and in which way database user defined datatypes (UDT) are preserved

ordinalScale.restriction: Y/Y but converted to standard datatypes/N

metric.name: database views preserved
metric.description: Assess if and in which way database views are preserved

ordinalScale.restriction: Y - converted to SQL99/Y - unchanged/ Y - converted to a table/N

metric.name: database routines preserved
metric.description: Assess if and in which way database routines are preserved

ordinalScale.restriction: Y - converted to SQL99/Y - unchanged/Y - only header available/N

metric.name: database columns datatypes preserved
metric.description: Assess if and in which way database column datatypes are preserved

ordinalScale.restriction: Y - compatible to original/Y - not compatible to original/N

metric.name: database numbers precision comparison
metric.description: Comparison of database number precisions

databasePrivilegesPreserved database privileges preserved Assess if and in which way database privileges are preserved
all/all connected to objects, users or roles/some missing/none all/all connected to objects, users or roles/some missing/none>

metric.name: database roles preserved
metric.description: Assess if and in which way database roles are preserved

ordinalScale.restriction: all/all connected to privileges or tables or views/some missing/none

metric.name: database strings preserved
metric.description: Assess if and in which way database strings are preserved

metric.name: database strings encodings preserved
metric.description: Assess if and in which way database string encodings are preserved

metric.name: database triggers preserved
metric.description: Assess if and in which way database triggers are preserved

ordinalScale.restriction: Y - defined and valid/Y but invalid/N

metric.name: database users preserved
metric.description: Assess if and in which way database users are preserved

ordinalScale.restriction: all/all connected to privileges or tables or views/some missing/none
